DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The purpose trial investigate effect insulin detemir weight change overweight obese patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Insulin Detemir Versus Insulin NPH Weight Change Overweight Obese With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c : 7.511.0 % BMI : 2540 kg/m2 Treatment OAD ( Oral Antidiabetic Drugs ) except metformin
